title: Why do people think blitz is good in low elo?
body: People seem to think he is good in low elo but realistically everyone that ever plays him ever has about 5% hook landing rate and a blitz that can't hook is completely and utterly useless.

replies.body: They think he's good because people in low ELO can't dodge those 5%? :P

If the Blitzcrank just relies on his Q, then he's probably a b!tchcrank who will follow you around the entire game and do nothing.

A good Blitz can actually peel and initiate without the use of his hook.
I just love Blitzcrank. He is the spare parts merchant for my mini. Please keep playing him ))))))
